## react package

## Functions

<table><thead><tr><th>

Function


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[createComponent(options)](./react.createcomponent.md)


</td><td>

Creates a polymorphic component with first-class style props and conditional styling capabilities.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[createConditions(hooks, conditions)](./react.createconditions.md)


</td><td>

Creates reusable conditions based on the provided hooks, each consisting of either a hook id or a logical combination using the `and`<!-- -->, `or`<!-- -->, and `not` operators.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[createHooks(selectors)](./react.createhooks.md)


</td><td>

Creates hooks from the provided selectors.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[createStyleProps(styleProps)](./react.createstyleprops.md)


</td><td>

Creates style props, with each entry either enabling a standard CSS property or defining a custom CSS property.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
